subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After three straight victories and a renewed sense of hope, the bad times returned quickly for the Knicks against a 76ers team that had been the worst in the N.B.A. for the past few weeks.
snippet: After three straight victories and a renewed sense of hope, the bad times returned quickly for the Knicks against a 76ers team that had been the worst in the N.B.A. for the past few weeks.
